name: Masako for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Masako is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Hong Kong, Masako always shocked parents with her antics. At school she decided that she will never wear dress again, that she will wear only pants. When she was 15 she started to dye her hair in all the colors of the rainbow and when she was 22, she just packed all her things and moved with his boyfriend to Kowloon.

Masako was super excited about it, but with reason had anxiety about being so far from friends and family. One of the ways her anxiety was coming out was with nightmares and night terrors. She's wake up violently sitting up in a cold sweat, gasping and whatnot. On one particular night Masako has woken up the sound of their doorbell ringing. Which at 4 in the morning is fucking nerve wracking. So she shook her boyfriend fully awake and told him she heard the doorbell and to go check it because Masako was scared. He quickly jumps up. Puts on clothes and grabs a bat. Goes all the way to the front door and opens it. Masako, terribly scared, is peeking around the corner watching it all go down. She see him step outside and nervously await the verdict of the situation when she hear him call out to her. "Babe?" And Masako respond real shaky, "Yes?" He stands in the doorway with a real frustrated tired look in his eyes and says, "We don't have a fucking doorbell."

Masako is very creative person, she loves experiments, mainly she is experimenting with her hair style, tattoos and of course in a bedroom.

Help Masako to take her place on the street!

short_description: Masako is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
